import React from 'react' import { AiOutlineShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { MdDone } from 'react-icons/md'; import { MdClear } from 'react-icons/md'; import { AiOutlineInfoCircle } from 'react-icons/ai'; const Card = ({ product, addProduct }) => { const [clicked, setCliked] = React.useState(false); const { id, product_name, img, price, product_description, stock } = product; const handleClick = (id) => { setCliked(!clicked); addProduct(id) }; return (

{product_name}

{price}

handleClick(id)} className="buy">
setCliked(!clicked)} className="remove">
{product_description &&
}

{product_description}

Disponibles:{stock}

); } export default Card
